place.name: GREETWELL
place.gazetteerText: GREETWELL, a parish in the district and county of Lincoln; on the river Witham, 2 miles E of Lincoln city and r. station. Acres, 1, 113. Real property, £1, 887. Pop., 69. Houses, 9. The property is divided between two. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £49. Patron, the Dean and Chapter of Lincoln. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
